channel.title: Assistant on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Assistant on Arrans github.io

item.title: khoj-ai/khoj
item.description: Your AI second brain. Self-hostable. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI (gpt, claude, gemini, llama, qwen, mistral). Get started - free.

item.title: huggingface/speech-to-speech
item.description: Speech To Speech: an effort for an open-sourced and modular GPT4-o

item.title: XandAI-project/Xandai-CLI
item.description: Your offline AI coding assistant in the terminal using ollama and LM studio
